name: Racing Horizon
description:
This game could be addictive to those who like racing games.

Ready to make those crazy fast and dangerous overtakes by really feeling it?

Unlike other classic games, we guarantee that you will have the most realistic speed experience with the high quality graphics and realistic physics.

Racing Horizon calls you to join an endless racing adventure!

Race however you’d like in 5 different modes.


*
REAL
TIME MULTIPLAYER - Either connect with your friends or other people from all around the world!

Create a custom lobby or join the multiplayer adventure with tournaments !

*
THE POLICE ARE AFTER YOU STEP ON IT !
- You have to be a real driver to get rid of the cops in the Police mode!

*
TRAFFIC IS NOT ALWAYS LIGHT !
Are you the only fast one ? Invite the other players in traffic for a duel, make them smell your tire smoke !

*
IMPOSSIBLE MISSIONS IN THE CAREER MODE ! - You need to work hard to complete these missions !
You also need a fast car!

*
RACE WITH THE TIME !
You will always need a better car, this is a mode in which you can earn different achievements !

*
FREE MODE !
It’s your right to have a stress-free race Drive however you want, crash into people, do anything you want !



Features

* Realistic engine, nitro and turbo sounds that are prepared and recorded uniquely for each car, will make you lose your mind ! * These eye-catching graphics are one of the best in all mobile games ! * Different immersive environments ! * Catch every moment with cockpit, Tail and Far camera angles ! * Customizable vehicles ! * Make millimetric overtakes with the Slow Motion feature! * Do you need a speed boost? Nitro is located at the right side of the screen ! Getting faster is good!

* Unlock the race achievements at the top of the leaderboard in Google Play Service with one move !

Key Points

* Challenging weather conditions will make you earn more cash ! *100 km/h is your sub-limit! Earn more as you go faster! *You are the man of the left lane! No rules, opposite lane is where you’re supposed to be!
